pr_title: Add the Missing Descriptions of the File Module in API Docs

timeline.author: ldclakmal

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            # Creates a FileInfo object.
          
          
            
            #
          
          
            
            # + name - Name of the file
          
          
            
            # + size - Size of the file (in bytes)
          
          
            
            # + modifiedTime - The last modified time of the file
          
          
            
            # + dir - Whether the file is a directory or not
          
          
            
            # + path - Absolute path of the file
